comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -106,11 +106,21 @@ Low-level changes

 ------------
 
-* An error is issued where previously a warning was issued when a setting in
+- An error is issued where previously a warning was issued when a setting in
   the config file was specified in the default section, but not overridden for
   the selected network. This change takes only effect if the selected network
   is not mainnet.
 
+Network

comments.body: It'd be helpful to give a little more context and say what motivates the change. E.g. is it a bugfix? security improvement? efficiency improvement?
